alert.note: Alert for Gilchrist; Suwannee (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 12 at 5:30AM EST by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Gilchrist, southwestern Columbia and southeastern Suwannee Counties through 615 AM EST... At 529 AM EST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Obrien to near Steinhatchee. Movement was northeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Lake City, Ichetucknee Spring, Columbia, Fort White, Five Points, Watertown, Winfield, Obrien, Branford and Hildreth. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 600 AM EST for northern Florida. A Tornado Watch also remains in effect until 1100 AM EST for northern Florida.
